headline: LuminArx Capital Management and SkyWorks Holdings Launch $1 Billion Lending Platform
summary: NEW YORK, January 23, 2026--LuminArx Capital Management ("LuminArx") today announced a new lending partnership with SkyWorks Holdings, LLC ("SkyWorks") to launch SkyLight Aero Finance Holdings DAC ("SkyLight"), a dedicated platform providing secured debt solutions to the global commercial aviation market.

raw.headline: LuminArx Capital Management and SkyWorks Holdings Launch $1 Billion Lending Platform

headline: Vulcan Value Partners Sold Skyworks Solutions (SWKS) for More Discounted Opportunities
summary: Investment management company Vulcan Value Partners recently released its fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. All the strategies of Vulcan Value Partners delivered positive results in the year. The Large Cap Composite (Net) returned -1.5% in Q4 and 7.9% YTD, the Small Cap Composite (Net) gained 3.2% in Q4 and 9.5% […]
